name: commentary

a spoken description of an event on the radio or television that is broadcast as the event happens: commentary on The commentary on the Olympic Games was much better on the other channel. After retiring as a player she did football commentary for the BBC.

a piece of writing, a work of art, etc. that explains a situation or expresses an opinion on it: There's good arts coverage in the newspaper, but not much political commentary.commentary on Is the sculpture meant to be a commentary on religion?
something that shows what something is really like: It is a sad commentary on our society that we have children locked up in adult jails.commentary on Is it possible that our judgment of others is really a commentary on how deserving we feel ourselves? It’s a sad commentary when technology that is supposed to bring people together causes so much division. running commentary
a continuous description of events as they are happening: He gave a hilarious running commentary of the match.
